post:
![](https://veesp.com/assets/banners/yox2021_en.png "")

It feels like Christmas again! February 12 is the start of the Year of the Ox and for everyone who has successfully missed all recent sales, we are launching a new promotion and offer discounts on all our products!

If you are a new client, use the promo code **50YOX2021** to get **50% off** the first payment for all VPS (including SSD & Windows-based servers) & dedicated server plans.

The discount is valid for all billing cycles and multiplies with our regular discounts. This means you can get **up to 57.5% off** when paying annually!

Already have servers running with us? Use the code **25YOX2021** to get a **25% discount** on the first payment for any VPS or dedicated server, no limit on the number of uses until the promotion ends or servers sold out! 😲

**[> Check out our powerful VPS <](https://veesp.com/products/vps/?utm_source=lowendtalk&utm_medium=topic&utm_campaign=yox2021 "Check out our powerful VPS")**

**[> And reliable dedicated servers <](https://veesp.com/products/dedicated-servers/?utm_source=lowendtalk&utm_medium=topic&utm_campaign=yox2021 "And reliable dedicated servers")**

Looking glass: [EU](http://lv-lg.veesp.com/ "EU") & [RU](http://ru-lg.veesp.com/ "RU")

And in case you forgot, here are some reasons to try our services 🤟:

* Unlimited traffic at 200 Mbps included
* Consistent 99.9% uptime with [public statistics](https://status.veesp.com/ "public statistics")
* Our own Tier II data center
* RESTful API for developers

Happy New Year! Again!
